trans-unit.source: Defines the modes in which classes derived from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase" /> perform their easing.
trans-unit.target: 定義模式，衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase" /> 的類別會用該模式執行其 easing。

trans-unit.source: The following graphs demonstrate the different values of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>, where *f*(*t*) represents the animation progress and *t* represents time.
trans-unit.target: 下列圖表示範不同的值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingFunctionBase.EasingMode%2A>，其中*f*(*t*) 表示的動畫進度和*t*代表時間。
![BackEase EasingMode 圖形。] (~/add/media/backease-graph.png "BackEase EasingMode 圖形。")
![BounceEase EasingMode 圖形。] (~/add/media/bounceease-graph.png "BounceEase EasingMode 圖形。")
![CircleEase EasingMode 圖形。] (~/add/media/circleease-graph.png "CircleEase EasingMode 圖形。")
![CubicEase EasingMode 圖形。] (~/add/media/cubicease-graph.png "CubicEase EasingMode 圖形。")

trans-unit.source: ![ElasticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/elasticease-graph.png "ElasticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.")
trans-unit.target: ![不同加/減速模式圖形的 ElasticEase。](~/add/media/elasticease-graph.png "的不同加/減速模式圖形的 ElasticEase。")

trans-unit.source: ![ExponentialEase graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/exponentialease-graph.png "ExponentialEase graphs of different easingmodes.")
trans-unit.target: ![不同加/減速模式的 ExponentialEase 圖形。](~/add/media/exponentialease-graph.png "不同加/減速模式的 ExponentialEase 圖形。")

trans-unit.source: ![QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.")
trans-unit.target: ![不同加/減速模式圖形的 QuarticEase。](~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "的不同加/減速模式圖形的 QuarticEase。")

trans-unit.source: ![QuadraticEase with graphs of different easingmodes](~/add/media/quadraticease-graph.png "QuadraticEase with graphs of different easingmodes")
trans-unit.target: ![不同加/減速模式圖形的 QuadraticEase](~/add/media/quadraticease-graph.png "的不同加/減速模式圖形的 QuadraticEase")

trans-unit.source: ![QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "QuarticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.")
trans-unit.target: ![不同加/減速模式圖形的 QuarticEase。](~/add/media/quarticease-graph.png "的不同加/減速模式圖形的 QuarticEase。")

trans-unit.source: ![QuinticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.](~/add/media/quinticease-graph.png "QuinticEase with graphs of different easingmodes.")
trans-unit.target: ![不同加/減速模式圖形的 QuinticEase。](~/add/media/quinticease-graph.png "的不同加/減速模式圖形的 QuinticEase。")

trans-unit.source: ![SineEase for different EasingMode values](~/add/media/sineease-graph.png "SineEase for different EasingMode values")
trans-unit.target: ![使用不同 EasingMode 值的 SineEase](~/add/media/sineease-graph.png "不同 EasingMode 值的 SineEase")

trans-unit.source: Interpolation follows the mathematical formula associated with the easing function.
trans-unit.target: 插補會遵循以緩動函式產生關聯的數學公式。

trans-unit.source: Interpolation uses <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseIn" /> for the first half of the animation and <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseOut" /> for the second half.
trans-unit.target: 插補會對前半段的動畫使用 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseIn" />，並對後半段的動畫使用 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Media.Animation.EasingMode.EaseOut" />。

trans-unit.source: Interpolation follows 100% interpolation minus the output of the formula associated with the easing function.
trans-unit.target: 插補會遵循 100% 插補減去以緩動函式產生關聯之公式輸出的規則。
